DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the psychological impact of psoriasis or hidradenitis suppurativa on patients, in order to compare both pathologies.
DOC.brief_title: Patients With Hidradenitis vs Patients With Psoriasis: Psychological Impact
DOC.criteria: Men and women at least 18 years old at the time of selection. Subjects diagnosed with psoriasis or hidradenitis suppurativa Subjects who had completed the questionnaires for psychological impact. Patients should be able to understand and communicate with the investigator. Subjects suffering from a serious concomitant illness. Subjects with a mental illness. Subjects who are performing psychiatric treatment. Patients who have alcohol dependence or drug abuse. Subjects that present legal incapacity or limited legal capacity. Subjects presenting illiteracy or language barriers.
